note.p: Blacksmith. Of Cudham, Kent, and later of Down. Father of William Reeves, blacksmith, of Down (1834/5–1915).
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/481/14/27/5), 1851 (HO107/1606/247/4), 1881 (RG11/855/88/11)
Certificate of death, 15 October 1900, Bromley, Kent (General Register Office, England)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 September 2016)
